item.title: Cottage restoration
item.description: Derelict cottage in the Irish landscape Table of contents Glossary Finding a cottage Inspection and survey Planning Walls Floors Roof Windows and doors Heating Resources I’m building this page to collect my notes, research and resources on the restoration of traditional Irish cottages. It is a project I’m planning to do with some help in the future when we move to Ireland so I’m doing a lot of prep and research work in advance to be ready when we get to it.
